item.title: HELP! i cant figure out how to make peeps and some items make the acc unusable
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

for making yourself admin search for this

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

and under it paste this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME)) { playerRights = 3; }
you might also need crown fixup…
if u need it add this under the list of mods-admin-owner

if (playerRights == 3) { out.write(2); //Crown fixup } else { out.write(playerRights);// mod level }

Read full topic
